sentences: Pääsuke tegi kiire lend üle maja.
Lennud olid tühistatud tormise ilma tõttu.
context: The Estonian word 'lend' primarily means 'flight' and is used to describe the act of flying or a journey through the air. It can refer to birds in flight, aircraft journeys, spacecraft flights, or even metaphorical uses like rapid movement or the collective group of students who graduate from an institution at the same time.
